# Default Person Properties

**API Collection**

The properties that a person record contains by default.

## Overview

You can add your own properties with the `ABPerson` method [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABPerson/addPropertiesAndTypes(_:)].

## Constants

- **kABFirstNameProperty**: First name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABLastNameProperty**: Last name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABFirstNamePhoneticProperty**: Phonetic representation of the first name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABLastNamePhoneticProperty**: Phonetic representation of the last name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABNicknameProperty**: Nickname. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABMaidenNameProperty**: Maiden name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABBirthdayProperty**: Birth date. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABDateProperty].
- **kABBirthdayComponentsProperty**: Birth date as date components. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABDateComponentsProperty].
- **kABOrganizationProperty**: Company name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABJobTitleProperty**: Job title. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABHomePageProperty**: Home web page. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABURLsProperty**: Web pages. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABMultiStringProperty].
- **kABCalendarURIsProperty**: Calendar URIs. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABMultiStringProperty].
- **kABEmailProperty**: Email addresses. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABMultiStringProperty].
- **kABAddressProperty**: Street addresses. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABMultiDictionaryProperty].
- **kABOtherDatesProperty**: Dates associated with a person. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABMultiDateProperty].
- **kABOtherDateComponentsProperty**: Dates associated with a person, as date components. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABMultiDateComponentsProperty].
- **kABRelatedNamesProperty**: Names of people related to a person.
- **kABDepartmentProperty**: Department name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABPersonFlags**: Property that specifies the name ordering and configuration of a record in the Address Book application.
- **kABPhoneProperty**: Generic phone number.
- **kABInstantMessageProperty**: Instant messaging ID.
- **kABNoteProperty**: Notes. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABSocialProfileProperty**: Social network profile.
- **kABMiddleNameProperty**: Middle name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABMiddleNamePhoneticProperty**: Phonetic representation of the middle name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABTitleProperty**: Title, such as “Mr.,” “Mrs.,” “General,” “Cardinal,” or “Lord.” Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABSuffixProperty**: Suffix, such as “Sr.,” “Jr.,” “III.,” or “Esq.” Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].

## Data Type Constants

- **Address Keys**: The keys used to specify the different fields in a `kABAddressProperty`.
- **Default Group Properties**: The properties that a group record contains by default.  Developers can add their own properties with the `ABGroup` method [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABGroup/addPropertiesAndTypes(_:)]
- **Default Multivalue List Labels**: The default labels contained in the Address Book database for specifying different values in a multivalue list. Users can also add their own labels.
- **Generic Multivalue List Labels**: The generic labels contained in the Address Book database for specifying different values in a multivalue list.
- **Multivalue Property**: A multivalue property type.
- **Default Record Properties**: Properties common to all types of records.
- **Property Types**: The possible [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABPropertyType] types for `ABRecord` properties:
